name: Sublime Archangel
text:
Flying
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Other creatures you control have exalted. (If a creature has multiple instances of exalted, each triggers separately.)

name: Sublime Exhalation
text:
Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)
Destroy all creatures.

editions.flavor: Exhale, and let the winds carry your soul for all eternity.

name: Submerge
text:
If an opponent controls a Forest and you control an Island, you may cast Submerge without paying its mana cost.
Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

name: Submerged Boneyard
text:
Submerged Boneyard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: Aether currents in the sky mirror water currents below, including the deadly rapids.
Aether currents in the sky mirror water currents below, including the deadly rapids.

text:
Subterranean Hangar enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Subterranean Scout
text: When Subterranean Scout enters the battlefield, target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

editions.flavor: When things get ugly above ground, goblins resort to alternate routes of passage.

name: Subterranean Shambler
text:
Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Subterranean Shambler enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

name: Subterranean Spirit
text:
Protection from red
{T}: Subterranean Spirit deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

editions.flavor:
"Air hot with sulfur. / Earth heaves beneath me. / Could it be the mountain / ate something bad?"
—Dwarven mining song

text: Subterranean Tremors deals X damage to each creature without flying. If X is 4 or more, destroy all artifacts. If X is 8 or more, create an 8/8 red Lizard creature token.

editions.flavor: The market is now closed.

name: Subtle Strike
text:
Choose one or both —
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

editions.flavor: Renegades do some of their best work right under the Consulate's nose.

name: Subversion
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

editions.flavor: Kerrick's corrupt domain swelled like a blister on Tolaria's skin.
Kerrick's corrupt domain swelled like a blister on Tolaria's skin.

name: Succumb to Temptation
text: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

editions.flavor: "Restraint is for the meek."

name: Su-Chi
text: When Su-Chi dies, add {C}{C}{C}{C} to your mana pool.

text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Some mages tapped into the time rifts, forcing upon others alternate timelines in which unimaginable horrors befall them.

name: Sudden Demise
text: Choose a color. Sudden Demise deals X damage to each creature of the chosen color.

editions.flavor: In the Skyfang Mountains, one misstep can mean the end of an entire clan.

name: Sudden Disappearance
text: Exile all nonland permanents target player controls. Return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Sudden Impact
text: Sudden Impact deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

editions.flavor:
"Some say it's better to think before you act. While those people are considering all the options, that's usually when I kill them."

name: Summit Apes

editions.flavor:
"If you climb Skyfang Peak, avoid the pass. Generations of apes made that trail, and they don't tolerate trespassers."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

"Do you hunt the yetis of the high peaks, stripling? They are as fierce as the bear that fears no foe and as sly as the mink that creeps unseen. You will be as much prey as they."
—Nitula, the Hunt Caller

"Do you not hunt the yetis of the high peaks, stripling? Their meat is as tender as a bear's and their blood as warming as fire. They are prey that will please Atarka."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller
